alert.note: Alert for Butts; Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Newton; Pike; Rockdale; Spalding; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:10PM EDT until June 25 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Spalding County in west central Georgia... Fayette County in north central Georgia... Pike County in west central Georgia... Monroe County in central Georgia... Northern Upson County in west central Georgia... Butts County in central Georgia... Northwestern Jones County in central Georgia... Newton County in north central Georgia... Southern Rockdale County in north central Georgia... Henry County in north central Georgia... Central Clayton County in north central Georgia... Jasper County in central Georgia... Lamar County in west central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 710 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Digbey to Monticello, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Covington, Barnesville, Jackson, Jonesboro, Forsyth, Monticello, Zebulon, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Senoia and Oxford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Newton; Pike; Rockdale; Spalding; Upson
